Posts.Content: they can go to hundreds and thousands. mine just jumped a few too. i would get scanned and recheck as soon as dr will let u, i beleive in these numbers, sometimes they dont show accurate... my friend stage 4 pancratic and numbers have never moved, but in general i have seen them dead on. xo
Posts.Title: tumoro markers

Posts.Content: hi i am a 2 yr breast cancer survivor i also know people who have many family members with a history. i do know some people who have had a double mastectomy.(i only had one with a reconstruction it is very comfortable and i work with horses so i am pretty active)take care and good luck ,jay
Posts.Title: Elective double mastectomy

Posts.Content: hi iam 2 yr breast cancer survivor, my tumors showed up white on ultrasound and dark on mammo, try 'med help.org' website, its great you post a question and a doctor writes you back in a couple hours, xo jay
Posts.Title: Can anyone offer assistance??

Posts.Content: wellll i may have a recurrence in lung/chest area. will get more scans in few weeks,it probably happened from 18 pos lymph nodes. i know this serious anyone have any input? thx jay
Posts.Title: mets to lungs

Posts.Content: hi jodie,thanks for your great message! it did cheer me up to hear your story.i was diagnosed 2 yrs ago and had 3 masses 5cm,3cm and 1cm mets to chest wall and 18 lymph nodes. had it all removed did reconstruction and hysterectomy chemo radiation. it negative to all tests which means no other medication.i also have had a cough not hard just little and persistant i  asked about it with some other questions and had several tests, the pet scan showed several things but worse was a small nodule in chest and a 7mm hazy nodule in lung.my dr put me on antibiotic for pneumonia for two weeks, i have reg check up end of february(which seems like a long time away)and he said get new scan in 4 months this seems like too long i am wondering if it is recurrence can it be cut out or is chemo only option? thanks for your   kind words and please check in when u get ur scan, gods blessings rt back to u, i sure cry and sing alot of jesus sons these days especially in car. xo jay
Posts.Title: mets to lungs

Posts.Content: hi has anyone tried a liver detox or flush after chemo to help weak immune system?thx jay
Posts.Title: liver detox for chemo?

Posts.Content: hi i have stage 4 met bc. 3 masses in breast and met to chest wall. 18 lymph nodes positive. diagonosed 11/05 finished several surgeries reconstruction,chemo and radiation. no other treatment due to node negative.my white cells were over 8000 thruout all of this (above normal)finished chem 15 mos ago and the last 9 mos my white cells have consistently been dropping now at 3000. has anyone had any similar problems? im thinking the cancer was awakened from the sugeries and is now compromising my whole body,maybe spreading in lymph system?please write any info. thx jay
Posts.Title: low white cells15 mos after chemo

Posts.Content: my friend a 60 y old 3 yr survivor got mets to bone in march and now liver and lungs, does anyone have a similar problem and  how is it going? thx
